channel.title: Everytime i compile, i can't run my server!
channel.description: well what the subject said, everytime i to add shops and stuff, then i compile, then run my server again, it says " Could not find main class: server. program will exit" Can someone please help me? im using a blank source " Chosen Pkz Blank " . It works fine if i dont compile it, it can run. but if i compile , that message shows up! please help :) !

item.title: Everytime i compile, i can't run my server!
item.dc:creator: @vovik vovik
item.description:
@vovik wrote:

you dont need to compile for editing non java files

Read full topic
